params.name: Flowchart name
params.description: The flowchart to start.

params.description: A tag to later identify this flowchart.

params.name: Set as current
params.description: Make this flowchart the current one on creation.

params.name: Start node tags
params.description: The tags of the node the flowchart should start in. Use multiple tags in a space separated string. The first node found that matches all tags will be used. If empty the default start node is used.

actions.name: Set flowchart
actions.description: Set a flowchart to use in the following actions.

params.name: Flowchart tag
params.description: The tag of the flowchart to set as the current one.

actions.name: End flowchart
actions.description: End the current flowchart. This destroys the created flowchart and the plugin will no longer have a current flowchart.

actions.name: End flowchart by tag
actions.description: End a flowchart by its tag.

params.name: Flowchart tag
params.description: The tag of the flowchart to end.

actions.name: Reset flowchart
actions.description: Reset the current flowchart, setting the current node to the default start node and clearing previous nodes.

actions.name: Reset flowchart by tag
actions.description: Reset a flowchart by its tag.

params.name: Flowchart tag
params.description: The tag of the flowchart to reset.

actions.name: Go to next node
actions.description: Go to the next node of the current flowchart via an output name or index.

params.name: Index or name
params.description: The name or index (0-based) of the output to follow.

actions.name: Go to node
actions.description: Jump to a node in the current flowchart.

params.name: Node tags
params.description: The tags of the node the flowchart should move to. Flow will move to the first node found that matches all the passed in tags.

actions.name: Go to previous node
actions.description: Go to the previous node of the current flowchart.

actions.name: Go to parent node
actions.description: Go to the parent node of the current node in the current flowchart.

params.name: Index or tags
params.description: The index (0-based) or tags of the parent node the flowchart should move to. In the case of using tags, flow will move to the first parent node that matches all the passed in tags.

actions.name: Go to default node
actions.description: Go to the next node of the current flowchart via the default output. If there is no default nothing will happen.
